programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As the President sends in GUN forces to stop Sonic from destroying the Mirror Towers, Dr. Eggman reveals that his Sunshine Balls are secretly brainwashing the citizens to turn against Sonic.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: When Sonic stands Amy up on a date she decides to go out with Sam Speed instead. Meanwhile, Bokkun reactivates a robot named Emerl to free Eggman from jail.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Nelson tries to maintain the faltering Thorndyke Industries due to his employees joining the Freedom Movement to emulate Sonic's carefree lifestyle, kitchen appliances begin to cause havoc around town.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP44 Lion, Cheatin' And Stealin [English Dub]
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car to mark the 50th anniversary of Australia's independence. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue out from under the Sydney Police's watchful eye, but then discovers that also inside the armored car is a nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata. Will Lupin choose the golden statue over Inspector Zenigata's life?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP45 Diamonds and Minx [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin. Showered with Hangman's bullets, Lupin and his gang return fire with rare wine. Meanwhile, Inspector Zenigata is closing in on Lupin. Will Lupin be able to outrun both Hangman and Inspector Zenigata?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP46 The Island of Dr. Derange [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the Wanted Club's auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs as part of Dr. Mad's human reconstruction experiment. Can Lupin, Jigen and Fujiko get off the island alive?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Eggman is on the loose and everyone is searching for him. While Mr. Stewart investigates Eggman's whereabouts, he is captured along with Chris in Eggman's secret hideout in the sewers.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: The President hosts a tournament with the red Chaos Emerald as the prize to lure Dr. Eggman. It's a heated battle that finds Sonic fighting alongside everyone, even the President himself, but strangely Dr. Eggman has yet to show himselfâ€¦

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: The battle for the red Chaos Emerald is heating up. As contestants duke it out for the glory and the prize it's Emerl who wins the tournament. But when Emerl receives the emerald, its power forces him to go on a rampage and attack everyone in the stadium.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP47 Crownin' Around [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy. After their initial heist fails, Lupin and his gang plan to take the crown on the day of Princess Mary's royal wedding. Will Big Ben chime in Lupin's favour?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP47 Crownin' Around [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy. After their initial heist fails, Lupin and his gang plan to take the crown on the day of Princess Mary's royal wedding. Will Big Ben chime in Lupin's favour?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP48 Vault Assault [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist falls short and fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault. Will Lupin get past their tight security measures and pull off the heist?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP49 Snake Charmer [English Dub]
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort. Fujiko, on the other hand, who is after Jacqueline's jewels, gets kidnapped by the Cobra crime syndicate. Blinded by love, will Lupin realize who the true venomous snake is?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: When Dr. Eggman learns that Knuckles has just discovered the oldest map in the world, which holds the location of the lost continent of Murasia, he sends Decoe and Bocoe on a mission to take the map away from Knuckles.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic and his friends are in pursuit of Dr. Eggman, who has fled into the volcano which lies at the world's bellybutton. They come upon the Murasians ruin which attributed its destruction to a supposed dragon god.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Legend of the Stone of Gelel
programme.desc: Drawn into a fierce struggle over the legendary Stone of Gelel, Naruto, Shikamaru, and Sakura must keep the stone from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: BLEACH: The Movie 2 - The DiamondDust Rebellion [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: After the treasured Ouin is stolen, Toshiro Hitsugaya disappears and becomes suspected of treason.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: As the news reports on Shishigami's attack on the police station, Shishigami hijacks a broadcast signal to publicly declare war on Japan, claiming he will kill 100 people immediately. Ando realizes Shishigami's plans and manages to thwart it with the help of Inuyashiki's power. Undeterred, Shishigami continues his killing, and announces he will kill 1000 tomorrow, devastating Inuyashiki.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: The day after the mass killings in Shinjuku, Shishigami begins dropping airplanes onto the city. After receiving word from Ando, Inuyashiki manages to stop a number of them from crashing. He then notices that Mari is trapped inside a burning building, but Shishigami appears and attacks him. Inuyashiki is desperately trying to make his way over to save Mari, but Shishigami is right on his heels.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Saving many lives in Shinjuku, Inuyashiki returns home to open up to his family about his robot body. His family accepts him, and they embrace. After losing both arms, Shishigami goes to Ando who condemns him and Shishigami disappears. Inuyashiki finds out a giant meteor is about to hit earth. With the whole world in chaos, Inuyashiki flys towards the meteor to protect his family.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto and his team are sent on a mission to guard Yukie Fujikaze, a popular actress starring in the hit movie "The Adventures of Princess Gale."

programme.title: BLEACH: THE MOVIE - Memories of Nobody [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: An evil clan is sending the World of the Living and the Soul Society on a collision course. Can Ichigo and his fellow Soul Reapers save the two worlds from annihilation?

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: Phantom Rouge [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Someone has stolen Kurapika's eyes! Gon and Killua investigate, but the Phantom Troupe is back!

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: As the news reports on Shishigami's attack on the police station, Shishigami hijacks a broadcast signal to publicly declare war on Japan, claiming he will kill 100 people immediately. Ando realizes Shishigami's plans and manages to thwart it with the help of Inuyashiki's power. Undeterred, Shishigami continues his killing, and announces he will kill 1000 tomorrow, devastating Inuyashiki.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: The day after the mass killings in Shinjuku, Shishigami begins dropping airplanes onto the city. After receiving word from Ando, Inuyashiki manages to stop a number of them from crashing. He then notices that Mari is trapped inside a burning building, but Shishigami appears and attacks him. Inuyashiki is desperately trying to make his way over to save Mari, but Shishigami is right on his heels.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Saving many lives in Shinjuku, Inuyashiki returns home to open up to his family about his robot body. His family accepts him, and they embrace. After losing both arms, Shishigami goes to Ando who condemns him and Shishigami disappears. Inuyashiki finds out a giant meteor is about to hit earth. With the whole world in chaos, Inuyashiki flys towards the meteor to protect his family.

programme.title: BLEACH: The Movie 2 - The DiamondDust Rebellion [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: After the treasured Ouin is stolen, Toshiro Hitsugaya disappears and becomes suspected of treason.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP50 The Second Time Around, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction, but is outsmarted by Fujiko, who takes the auction items for herself, as she usually does. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life. Has Cornelia really risen from her grave and if so, why?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP51 The Second Time Around, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them. Cornelia is caught between the lies her father tells her and her memories of love for Lupin. Will Lupin be able to save Cornelia?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP52 Emmanuelle in Bangkok [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too. Lupin, love-struck and being manipulated by Emmanuelle, goes to the temple where the Holy Scripture is hidden and takes on the challenge of stealing it. Stuck between two beauties, whom will Lupin get the treasure for?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Chris spends his last day with Sonic while they prepare for their trip home, the President's army colonel decides to act on his own to capture Dr. Eggman.
